Typical symptoms include cough, chest pain, fever, and difficulty breathing.  Treatment is typically with antibiotics and may include supportive care such as oxygen therapy, pain control, and assisted breathing if required.  It is recommended that individuals with pneumonia get plenty of rest, drink lots of fluids, and stay away from smoking and air pollution. Pneumonia Pneumonia
response: Recovery time for pneumonia varies depending on the severity of your symptoms and overall health. Typically, it can take a few weeks to fully recover. Just make sure to take your antibiotics and follow your doctor's instructions closely.
